actions.text: On agreeing to the Smith (WA) amendment (A020) Agreed to by recorded vote: 286 - 124 (Roll no. 513).

description: Amendment reduces the appropriation for the Woodrow Wilson International Center for Scholars by $1 million.
purpose: An amendment to reduce the funds appropriated in the bill for the Woodrow Wilson International Center for Scholars from $6 million to $5 million. The intent of the amendment would be to reduce administrative overhead and funding for interns and general expenses.
